amendatorysection.catchline: Tax Equity and Educational Opportunities Fund; created; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Tax Equity and Educational Opportunities Fund is created. The fund shall receive dedicated income tax appropriations and appropriations made by the Legislature to fund the Tax Equity and Educational Opportunities Support Act and shall be administered by the state board. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
